hero.name: 张紫琪
hero.title: Innovative Leader in Stainless Steel Industry
hero.subtitle: 13 years of expertise in stainless steel, leading Shunjiaxing Group's innovation
hero.description: Building an industry benchmark enterprise with over 200M RMB annual revenue through the power of gentleness and resilience
hero.tagline: Founder of Guangdong Foshan Shunjiaxing Stainless Steel Group

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Female Entrepreneur with Gentleness and Resilience
about.description: With 13 years of deep expertise in the stainless steel industry, I have built a trusted enterprise with the unique meticulousness and resilience of women. I believe that true leadership comes from dedication to quality and pursuit of innovation.
about.storySubtitle: The transformation journey from industry newcomer to business leader
about.storyContent1: In 2011, I entered the stainless steel industry with passion for manufacturing. At that time, I was just a young newcomer, full of curiosity and awe for this industry. Starting from basic positions, I deeply understood every production process and learned every technical detail.
about.storyContent2: As a woman in this traditional manufacturing industry, I faced more challenges than my male counterparts. But I always believe that gentleness and resilience can coexist, and innovation and responsibility can go hand in hand. Every difficulty is an opportunity for growth, and every setback makes me more determined.
about.storyContent3: In 2016, with 5 years of industry experience and keen market insight, I founded Shunjiaxing Stainless Steel. From the initial small team to the current enterprise with over 300 people, from local market to international stage, I have always adhered to the philosophy of creating quality with craftsmanship and leading the future with innovation.

vision.title: Global Vision
vision.description: Based in Foshan, facing the world. Our products have been exported to Europe, America and other regions, committed to building an internationally competitive stainless steel brand.

journey.title: My Entrepreneurial Story
journey.subtitle: From entrepreneurial enlightenment in 2004 to becoming an industry benchmark today, each stage is a witness of growth
journey.scrollHint: Swipe to view the complete story

summary.title: 21-Year Entrepreneurial Journey, From Zero to Billions

items.title: Mobile Retail Chain Business
items.description: Started mobile retail chain business, accumulated valuable entrepreneurial experience, laying a solid commercial foundation for subsequent enterprise development.

items.title: Entered Stainless Steel Industry
items.description: Entered the stainless steel industry with dreams, starting a new journey. Started learning industry knowledge from scratch and deeply understanding market needs.

items.title: First Processing Plant Established
items.description: Established the first stainless steel processing plant, taking a solid step. Small team with big dreams, creating every product with craftsmanship spirit.

items.title: Shunjiaxing Stainless Steel Founded
items.description: Officially established Foshan Shunjiaxing Stainless Steel Co., Ltd., marking the enterprise's entry into a new historical stage of development.

items.title: Revenue Breakthrough 380M RMB
items.description: Enterprise revenue broke through 380 million RMB, the team continued to grow, and product quality gained widespread market recognition.

items.title: Upgraded to Guangdong Shunjiaxing
items.description: Upgraded to Guangdong Shunjiaxing Stainless Steel Co., Ltd., with registered capital reaching 10 million RMB, significantly enhancing enterprise strength.

items.title: 300+ Employees 200M+ Revenue
items.description: Employee scale exceeds 300 people, annual revenue stable at over 200 million RMB, becoming a benchmark enterprise in the industry.

business.title: My
business.subtitle: Industrial Quality, Crafted with Heart
business.description: Shunjiaxing Stainless Steel focuses on R&D, production and sales of high-quality stainless steel products. We are driven by technological innovation and based on quality, providing high-quality stainless steel solutions for global customers.

advantages.title: Core Advantages
advantages.description: With technological innovation, quality assurance and service excellence, we have established strong competitive advantages in the industry

innovation.title: Technological Innovation
innovation.description: Continuous investment in R&D, mastering core technologies, achieving multiple breakthroughs in stainless steel surface treatment processes, with product quality reaching international advanced levels.

quality.title: Quality Assurance
quality.description: Strict quality management system, from raw material procurement to finished product delivery, every link has strict quality control to ensure products meet international standards.

service.title: Service Excellence
service.description: Customer-centered, providing comprehensive solutions from product design to after-sales service, establishing a complete customer service system.

waterWave.name: Stainless Steel Water Wave Panel
waterWave.description: Elegant water wave texture design, suitable for high-end decorative places, smooth and delicate surface with excellent corrosion resistance.

vintage.name: Stainless Steel Vintage Panel
vintage.description: Unique aging process, creating retro texture, showing the beauty of time precipitation, widely used in characteristic buildings.

copper.name: Stainless Steel Copper-like Panel
copper.description: Perfect copper panel effect, combining beauty and practicality, lower cost, easier maintenance, longer service life.

mirror.name: Stainless Steel Mirror Panel
mirror.description: High-quality mirror finish, enhancing spatial visual effects, suitable for modern architectural interior and exterior decoration, excellent reflection effect.

etching.name: Stainless Steel Etched Panel
etching.description: Precision etching process, customizable patterns, demonstrating exquisite technology, widely used in signage and decoration fields.

company.name: Guangdong Shunjiaxing Stainless Steel Co., Ltd.
company.description: Industry benchmark enterprise with over 200M RMB annual revenue and 300+ employees

factory.title: Production Base Display
factory.description: Advanced production equipment and modern management systems ensure product quality and delivery capabilities

main.name: Main Factory
main.description: Modern production base covering 10,000㎡, equipped with advanced production equipment and complete supporting facilities.

plating.name: Electroplating Factory
plating.description: Professional electroplating production line, using environmentally friendly processes to ensure product surface treatment quality and environmental protection.

mirror.name: Mirror Processing Factory
mirror.description: Precision mirror processing technology, using imported equipment to ensure mirror effects reach international advanced levels.

productDisplay.title: Premium Product Series
productDisplay.description: Diversified product lines meet the needs of different application scenarios, each product reflects our craftsmanship spirit

certifications.title: Quality Management System Certification
certifications.description: Obtained ISO quality management system certification, strictly implemented according to international standards, ensuring every product meets high quality requirements and provides reliable guarantee for customers.

insights.title: My
insights.subtitle: Key Content for Building Trust
insights.description: 13 years of deep thinking and sharing in the stainless steel industry, covering industry trends, digital transformation, international development and other in-depth insights in multiple fields.

cta.title: Want to Learn More Industry Insights?
cta.description: Subscribe to KIKI's professional insights to get the latest stainless steel industry trends and developments. Weekly curated content delivered directly to your inbox, stay synchronized with industry leaders.

contact.title: Contact KIKI
contact.subtitle: Looking Forward to Cooperation and Exchange

footer.company: Guangdong Shunjiaxing Stainless Steel Co., Ltd.
footer.description: Focusing on R&D, production and sales of high-quality stainless steel products, injecting new vitality into industry development from the unique perspective of female entrepreneurs.
